sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SAO, a territory, called a kingdom, of Africa, on the gold-coaſt of Guinea, hardly two miles in length along the ſhore. It produces abundance of Indian corn, yams, potatoes, palm-wine, and oil. The inhabitants are very treacherous, and there is no dealing with them without a great deal of caution. It contains ſeveral villages, of which Sabo is the principal; and the Dutch have a fort here called Naſſau.
